title: Varus Top OP
body:
^

He may be the next marksman to become a top laner (mana is the only problem - solved  {{item:3004}}

replies.body: You need to take in to account that you are the lowest rank possible, if it was a riven that wasn't terrible, you would get ripped a new asshole.

> [{quoted}](name=Batchy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=IM0Ox4aP,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2014-12-18T05:22:15.620+0000)
>
> You need to take in to account that you are the lowest rank possible, if it was a riven that wasn't terrible, you would get ripped a new asshole.

She was silver 3 (it was norms tho) and tbh i was just %%%%ing around and it worked

> [{quoted}](name=DarkShade918,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=IM0Ox4aP,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2014-12-18T05:22:56.460+0000)
>
> She was silver 3 (it was norms tho) and tbh i was just %%%%ing around and it worked

silver 3... Like I said, try playing against a Riven that isn't terrible.
that is not a helpful comment. try to be constructive if you are going to bother posting.
no single target spells though. which kinda nerfs the manamune.

> [{quoted}](name=Kajata,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=IM0Ox4aP,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2014-12-18T04:14:08.865+0000)
>
> no single target spells though. which kinda nerfs the manamune.

I get what you're saying, i just build it for varus coz he has such little mana, then proceed with {{item:3022}}  and other semi tanky items that allow him to %%%% all people up and make him a fighter moreso than a marksman
i do gt you though. honestly. i use mana regen runes. works well enough for me.
Are you trying to say Varus beats Riven top lane?

> [{quoted}](name=Batchy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=IM0Ox4aP,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2014-12-18T05:18:17.335+0000)
>
> Are you trying to say Varus beats Riven top lane?

Specifically a riven with a gragas top, it wasn't hard (not easy either - had to call jg a few times)
The only ADC that works top is Quinn, and that's because she's freelo cancer with an overloaded kit.

> [{quoted}](name=Sackboy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=IM0Ox4aP,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2014-12-18T05:09:05.512+0000)
>
> The only ADC that works top is Quinn, and that's because she's freelo cancer with an overloaded kit.

Vayne and Lucian work well also

> [{quoted}](name=DarkShade918,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=IM0Ox4aP,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2014-12-18T05:11:22.861+0000)
>
> Vayne and Lucian work well also

No they don't.
I can't think of a single top lane matchup that he would win.

> [{quoted}](name=Batchy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=IM0Ox4aP,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2014-12-18T04:37:13.978+0000)
>
> I can't think of a single top lane matchup that he would win.

1v2 gragas and riv, 1v1 zac, 1v1 skarner all matchups i've won so far, to be fair they're all melee tho
